name: Wizard or die
description:
"Step into the mystical world of magic and sorcery, harness the power of spells and incantations, and become the ultimate wizard warrior as you kill hordes of fearsome creatures and rival wizards"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This game was made in 4 Days for the international college jam #2 (ICJ #2)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Made by:

Jelger Dijkgraaf : Coding

Erkka Kröger : Desing, Art

Henri Tikkala : Audio, Art

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

W,A,S,D : Move

SPACE : Dash

LMC : Shoot
